text: None ni nde azoba ari umuhemu mukuru gusumba uwabeshera Imana yiwe y’ukuri, canke uwuhakana amajambo yayo, aho hazoshika ahantu Imana yabandikiye kugeza aho bazoshikirwa n’intumwa zacu zizo bica, aho niho bazobabwira bati:- bari hehe abo mwahora musenga aho gusenga Imana y’ukuri? Nabo bazo kwishura bati:- barazimanganye kandi bazokwibera ivyabona bonyene yuko bari abahakanyi b’Imana
